long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No more having to switch back and forth between your CRM and inbox to track the lead details. SalezShark helps you save all your customer details to your CRM effortlessly without having to interrupt your workflow.
You can now fetch all the essential contact data from your Gmail account with just a click of a button.

Different aspects of prospect/customer management that SalezShark Chrome Extension helps in:

Fetch Contacts/Add leads/Add account: Add contact and details straight to the CRM to create a lead and turn the potential prospects into customers.

Log Every Customer Interaction: Automatically add all your interactions, tasks, and activities straight to the CRM from your Gmail account.

View Tasks: View lead, task, and activity details in Gmail to accordingly follow up with your leads.
 
The SalezShark chrome extension is ideal for:
Salespeople that use Gmail or Gmail apps
Past deal activities reference including emails, phone calls, or deal activities
Scheduling the follow-up tasks with the leads or viewing the upcoming to-do items
